name: ereldm
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0

stmt.origin: 3bitr3d(w0, wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c0, cdm(c3)), wcel(c2, cdm(c3)))

-| wi(w0, wb(wcel(c2, cdm(c3)), wcel(c2, c1)))

comment: Equality of equivalence classes implies equivalence of domain membership. (Contributed by NM, 28-Jan-1996.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 12-Aug-2015.)
